| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [EvilHack 0.8.3 - monst.c, line 3888](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/0.8.3/src/monst.c#L3888) |

A **giant crocodile**, :, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). The giant crocodile is a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), [oviparous](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous") and [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal") that is the strongest monster in the [lizard](/wiki/Lizard_\(monster_class\) "Lizard (monster class)") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class"). Giant crocodiles are [thick-skinned](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned"), [amphibious](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious") and capable of [swimming](/wiki/Swimming "Swimming"), and move faster underwater than they do on land.

A giant crocodile has a bite attack and a claw attack.

## Generation

Randomly-generated giant crocodiles are always created hostile. A [crocodile](/wiki/Crocodile "Crocodile") can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a giant crocodile, and [eggs](/wiki/Egg "Egg") laid by giant crocodiles will hatch into [baby crocodiles](/wiki/Baby_crocodile "Baby crocodile").

A giant crocodile is generated in the Sewers of Waterdeep map of [Mines' End](/wiki/Mines%27_End "Mines' End") at level creation, and a giant crocodile is generated within the [sewage](/wiki/Sewage "Sewage") of the [Hidden Dungeon](/wiki/Hidden_Dungeon "Hidden Dungeon") at level creation.

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for crocodile](/wiki/Crocodile#Encyclopedia_entry "Crocodile").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Giant_crocodile\&action=edit)*

html:
Giant crocodile

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
: giant crocodile (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks Bite 4d4, Claw 3d6
: giant crocodile (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks

Bite 4d4, Claw 3d6

Base level 12
Base experience 201
Speed 9
Base AC 1
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1600
Nutritional value 800
Size Huge
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A giant crocodile:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
Reference EvilHack 0.8.3 - monst.c, line 3888

A giant crocodile, :, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. The giant crocodile is a strong, oviparous and carnivorous animal that is the strongest monster in the lizard monster class. Giant crocodiles are thick-skinned, amphibious and capable of swimming, and move faster underwater than they do on land.

A giant crocodile has a bite attack and a claw attack.

Generation

Randomly-generated giant crocodiles are always created hostile. A crocodile can grow up into a giant crocodile, and eggs laid by giant crocodiles will hatch into baby crocodiles.

A giant crocodile is generated in the Sewers of Waterdeep map of Mines' End at level creation, and a giant crocodile is generated within the sewage of the Hidden Dungeon at level creation.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for crocodile.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''giant crocodile''', {{brown|:}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. The giant crocodile is a [[strong]], [[oviparous]] and [[carnivorous]] [[animal]] that is the strongest monster in the [[Lizard (monster class)|lizard]] [[monster class]]. Giant crocodiles are [[thick-skinned]], [[amphibious]] and capable of [[swimming]], and move faster underwater than they do on land.

A giant crocodile has a bite attack and a claw attack.

==Generation==
Randomly-generated giant crocodiles are always created hostile. A [[crocodile]] can [[grow up]] into a giant crocodile, and [[egg]]s laid by giant crocodiles will hatch into [[baby crocodile]]s.

A giant crocodile is generated in the Sewers of Waterdeep map of [[Mines' End]] at level creation, and a giant crocodile is generated within the [[sewage]] of the [[Hidden Dungeon]] at level creation.
